lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bousquet said the company, among other things, was accused of not properly investigating financial transactions and of issuing a favorable opinion in August 1985 that relied on misrepresentations of Technical Equities management.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Penalties could range from censure to revocation of KMG Main Hurdman's license to do business in California.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: California regulators said they were seeking disciplinary action against the accounting firm KMG Main Hurdman as the result of a 1985 audit of Technical Equities Corp., an investment firm that filed for bankruptcy last year.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Penalties could range from censure to revocation of KMG Main Hurdman's license to do business in California.
